title: Client Issues
body: So whenever i finish a game the client messes up my internet. I have to quit out of league and turn my wifi off and on from my computer after every match. On low spec mode, any solutions?

replies.body: How exactly is your client messing up after games? Without much information it's a little hard to troubleshoot correctly, but we should start by running through this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to cover some of the more common issues.
It tells me that I have disconnected from the server and it is trying to reconnect even though it never does, I have to quit and log back in every time

I have to wait almost 3 minutes after every game because of the new client. I know it have to load again (low spec mode) but I also can't use my Browser in this time because idk why but it doessn't load the pages or if, then it takes ages. Only Spotify and teamspeak3 are working in this time. (On other devices the Internet is still working perfectly). Even if it doessn't sound like it, but 3 minutes are a lot for a gamer.
